value.title: 5 Lifesaving ⛑ tips in Power Bi you might not know
value.excerpt: You know how this works by now right? If I learn something useful, I share it here with you and in today's video I am going to share my top 5 power bi tips to fix current issues and cool functionality.   Did I manage to surprise you with a tip you didnt know? #curbal #powerbi #5tips  Keynotes: 1. Word

value.title: Automatic refresh in Power BI desktop - Power BI desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: In the october power bi desktop update, they released the possibility to have automatic page refresh for direct queries in power bi desktop and the service too.  Here we go through how it works and what you need to watch out for.  Link to the docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/desktop-automatic-page-refresh

value.title: DAX Fridays! #74: PREVIOUSDAY, PREVIOUSMONTH, PREVIOUSQUARTER, PREVIOUSYEAR
value.excerpt: In today’s video I we will go through how to build a time intelligence measure in DAX using the PREVIOUSDAY, PREVIOUSMONTH, PREVIOUSQUARTER, PREVIOUSYEAR.  We will first go through PREVIOUSYEAR DAX function and explain how can those functions can be combined with CALCULATE to create the correct measure.

value.title: DAX Fridays! #81: CALCULATETABLE

CALCULATETABLE allows you to create virtual tables that you can then filter using multiple conditions and use that table to make further calculations.   What is the difference between CALCULATETABLE and CALCULATE?  The first one

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.  Processing Options:  https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/multidimensional-models/processing-options-and-settings-analysis-services?view=asallproducts-allversions

value.title: Dynamic labels in Power BI using DAX

value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration. Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful

value.title: Power BI Tutorial | Working with JSON data
